title: Predatory Spirits
description:
Many of you have seen a shadow out of the corner of your eye, or had a feeling in your gut you were not alone, most likely you encountered a ghost. But the idea of an entity is so terrifying, it's often brushed off as nothing. An apparition can be friendly, but it can also be a murderous phantom seeking revenge. One thing is certain, if an entity is lurking, it wants something from you.

First, enter at your own risk
Followed by discarded totems invite death 
Then, killer history repeats itself 
Finally in our featured story, respect the dead, or become one

Go to www.https://greenchef.com/scary130 and use code SCARY130 to get $130 off, plus free shipping
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
